You've won the honour of embarking on a great and noble quest.
Quest? I'm already on a quest, a quest to get my swamp back.
translation.ko: 임무? 난 이미 할 일이 있어 내 습지를 돌려줘

translation.en: -Your swamp? -Yeah, my swamp!
Where you dumped those fairy tale creatures!
[crowd murmuring] Indeed. All right, ogre, I'll make you a deal.
Go on this quest for me, and I'll give you your swamp back.
translation.ko: 이 임무를 완수하면 네 습지를 돌려주지

translation.en: Exactly the way it was?
Down to the last slime-covered toadstool.
-And the squatters? -As good as gone.
translation.ko: - 무단 침입자들은? - 다시는 귀찮게 안 할 거야

translation.en: What kind of quest?
[Donkey] Let me get this straight. You're gonna go fight a dragon
and rescue a princess just so Farquaad will give you back a swamp,
which you only don't have because he filled it full of freaks in the first place.
translation.ko: 처음부터 그 습지는 파콰드 것이 아니라 네 거잖아

translation.en: Is that about right?
Maybe there's a good reason donkeys shouldn't talk.
translation.ko: 말 못 하는 당나귀가 더 나은지도 모르겠어

translation.en: I don't get it. Why don't you just pull some of that ogre stuff on him?
translation.ko: 이해가 안 돼, 슈렉 왜 오거처럼 안 했어?

translation.en: Throttle him, lay siege to his fortress,
translation.ko: 파콰드 목을 조르고 성을 점령한 뒤

translation.en: grind his bones to make your bread, the whole ogre trip.
translation.ko: 그놈 뼛가루로 빵이나 만들어 먹으면 좋았잖아

translation.en: Oh, I know what.
Maybe I could have decapitated an entire village
and put their heads on a pike,
gotten a knife, cut open their spleen and drink their fluids.
translation.ko: 칼로 비장을 잘라 그 즙을 마실 걸 그랬지?

translation.en: Does that sound good to you?
Uh, no, not really, no.
For your information, there's a lot more to ogres than people think.
translation.ko: 넌 잘 모르겠지만 세상에 알려진 게 다가 아냐

translation.en: Example? Example?
translation.ko: - 그럼 뭐가 또 있는데? - 뭐가 있느냐고?

translation.en: -Okay, um, ogres are like onions. -[sniffs] They stink?
translation.ko: 어디 보자, 오거는 양파와 같지 - 냄새가 고약해? - 맞아, 아니!

translation.en: -Yes-- No! -They make you cry?
translation.ko: - 냄새가 고약해? - 맞아, 아니! - 눈물 나게 하는구나? - 아냐!

translation.en: -No. -Oh,You leave them out in the sun,
they get all brown, start sproutin' little white hairs.
No! Layers!
Onions have layers.
Ogres have layers! Onions have layers.
You get it? We both have layers. [sighs]
Oh, you both have layers. Oh.
[sniffs] You know, not everybody likes onions.
translation.ko: 그런데 모두가 양파를 좋아하는 건 아냐

translation.en: Cake! Everybody loves cakes! Cakes have layers.
translation.ko: 케이크! 케이크는 다들 좋아해! 게다가 층으로 돼 있지

translation.en: I don't care... what everyone likes.
Ogres are not like cakes.
translation.ko: 난 지금 오거를 케이크에 비유한 게 아냐

translation.en: You know what else everybody likes? Parfaits.
Have you ever met a person, you say, "Let's get some parfait,"
they say, "No, I don't like no parfait"?
translation.ko: 거절하는 사람 본 적 있어? 진짜 맛있거든

translation.en: -Parfaits are delicious. -No!
translation.ko: 거절하는 사람 본 적 있어? 진짜 맛있거든 그만해!

translation.en: You dense, irritating, miniature beast of burden!
translation.ko: 이렇게 멍청하고 성가시니 평생 짐이나 나르며 살지!

translation.en: Ogres are like onions! End of story.
translation.ko: 오거는 양파와 같다니까 더는 토 달지 마

translation.en: Bye-bye. See ya later.
Parfaits may be the most delicious thing on the whole damn planet.
translation.ko: 파르페만큼 맛있는 건 세상에 없을 거야

translation.en: [Shrek] You know, I think I preferred your humming.
[Donkey] Do you have a tissue or something? I'm making a mess.
Just the word parfait make me start slobbering.
translation.ko: 파르페 얘길 했더니 군침이 돌아서 말이야

translation.en: Ooh! Shrek! Did you do that?
You gotta warn somebody before you just crack one off.
My mouth was open and everything.
Believe me, Donkey, if it was me, you'd be dead.
translation.ko: - 입을 벌리고 있었단 말이야 - 장담하는데 그게 내 방귀면 넌 벌써 죽었어

translation.en: [sniffs] It's brimstone.
-We must be getting close. -Yeah, right, brimstone.
translation.ko: - 거의 다 왔나 봐 - 유황 좋아하네

translation.en: Don't be talking about it's the brimstone.
I know what I smell. It wasn't no brimstone.
It didn't come off no stone neither.
Sure, it's big enough, but look at the location.
Uh, Shrek? Uh, remember when you said ogres have layers?
Oh, aye.
Well, I have a bit of a confession to make.
Donkeys don't have layers. We wear our fear right out there on our sleeves.
translation.ko: 당나귀는 층이 없어 감정이 얼굴에 그대로 나타나지

translation.en: -Wait a second. Donkeys don't have sleeves -You know what I mean.
You can't tell me you're afraid of heights.
No, I'm just a little uncomfortable about being on a rickety bridge
translation.ko: 겁까지는 아니고 약간 우려가 된다 이거지

translation.en: over a boiling lake of lava!
Come on, Donkey. I'm right here beside ya, okay?
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 동키 내가 옆에 있잖아

translation.en: For emotional support,
we'll just tackle this thing together one little baby step at a time.
translation.ko: 한 번에 한 발자국씩 천천히 가는 거야

translation.en: -Really? -Really, really.
-Okay, that makes me feel so much better. -Just keep moving.
And don't look down. Don't look down. Okay, don't look down.
translation.ko: - 내려다보면 안 돼 - 알았어, 내려다보지 마

translation.en: Don't look down. Keep on moving. Don't look down.
translation.ko: 내려다보지 마 그냥 계속 가는 거야

translation.en: [gasps] Shrek! I'm lookin' down!
Oh, God, I can't do this! Just let me off, please!
-But you're already halfway. -But I know that half is safe!
Okay, fine. I don't have time for this. You go back.
-Shrek, no! Wait! -Just, Donkey--
-Let's have a dance then, shall we? -Don't do that!
translation.ko: - 난 여기서 춤이라도 추겠다 - 하지 마!

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Do what?
-Oh, this? -Yes, that!
Yes? Yes, do it. Okay.
[screams] No, Shrek!
-No! Stop it! You said do it! -I'm doin' it.
translation.ko: - 그만! 멈춰! - 더 해달라며? 하고 있잖아

translation.en: I'm gonna die. I'm gonna die. Shrek, I'm gonna die.
That'll do, Donkey. That'll do.
Cool.
[Donkey] So where is this fire-breathing pain-in-the-neck anyway?
Inside, waiting for us to rescue her.
[chuckles] I was talkin' about the dragon, Shrek.
translation.ko: 성안에, 우리가 구해주길 기다리고 있지 난 용을 말한 거였어

translation.en: [Donkey whispering] You afraid?
No, but-- Shh.
Oh, good. Me neither. [gasps]
'Cause there's nothin' wrong with bein' afraid.
Fear's a sensible response to an unfamiliar situation.
translation.ko: 낯선 상황에 부닥치면 누구나 겁나게 마련이거든

translation.en: Unfamiliar dangerous situation, I might add.
With a dragon that breathes fire and eats knights and breathes fire,
it sure doesn't mean you're a coward
if you're a little scared you know what I mean.
I sure as heck ain't no coward. I know that. [gasps]
Donkey, two things, okay?
Shut... up.
Now go over there and see if you can find any stairs.
Stairs? I thought we was lookin' for the princess.
The princess will be up the stairs in the highest room in the tallest tower.
translation.ko: 공주가 있는 가장 높은 탑 맨 꼭대기 방에 가려면 계단을 통해야지

translation.en: -What makes you think she'll be there? -I read it in a book once.
translation.ko: - 거기 있다고 누가 그래? - 책에서 읽었어

translation.en: Cool. You handle the dragon. I'll handle the stairs.
translation.ko: 좋아, 넌 용을 맡아 난 계단을 찾아볼게

translation.en: I'll find those stairs. I'll whip their butt too.
That's right. Those stairs won't know which way they're goin'.
I'm gonna take drastic steps.
Kick it to the kerb. Don't mess with me. I'm the stair master.
translation.ko: 본때를 보여줄 거라고 난 계단 전문이거든

translation.en: I've mastered the stairs. I wish I had a step right here, right here.
translation.ko: 계단 분야 고수지 여기 어디 계단 없나?

translation.en: I'd step all over it.
Well, at least we know where the princess is, but where's the--
Dragon! [screams]
Donkey, look out! [screams]
-Got ya! -[roars]
No. Oh, no. No! [screams]
-Oh, what large teeth you have. -[growls]
I mean, white, sparkling teeth. I know you probably hear this all the time
translation.ko: 하얗고 윤이 나 이런 얘기 먹잇감한테 늘 듣겠지만

translation.en: from your food, but you must bleach, or something,
'cause that is one dazzling smile you got there.
Do I detect a hint of minty freshness?
And you know what else? You're-- You're a girl dragon!
Oh, sure! I mean, of course you're a girl dragon.
'Cause, you're just reeking of feminine beauty.
Uh, what's the matter with you? You got something in your eye?
Man, I'd really love to stay, but, you know, I'm, uh-- [coughs]
translation.ko: 너랑 좀 더 얘기 나누고 싶지만

translation.en: I'm an asthmatic, and I don't know if it'd work out
if you're gonna blow smoke rings and stuff.
translation.ko: 우린 궁합이 좀 안 맞는 것 같네

translation.en: Shrek! [gasps]
[whimpering] No! Shrek! Shrek! Shrek!
-Wake up! -What?
Are you Princess Fiona?
I am, awaiting a knight so bold as to rescue me.
translation.ko: 맞아 용감한 기사가 구해주길 오랫동안 기다렸어

translation.en: Oh, that's nice. Now let's go!
But wait, Sir Knight.
This be-ith our first meeting.
Should it not be a wonderful, romantic moment?
translation.ko: 가슴 떨리고 낭만적이어야 하는 거 아냐?

translation.en: -Yeah, sorry, lady. There's no time. -Hey, wait. What are you doing?
translation.ko: 그렇지, 그런데 시간이 별로 없어 기다려, 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: You should sweep me off my feet,
out yonder window and down a rope onto your valiant steed.
translation.ko: 밧줄을 타고 내려가 말에 올라야 하는 거 아냐?

translation.en: You've had a lot of time to plan this, haven't you?
But we have to savour this moment!
translation.ko: 이 순간을 이렇게 낭비할 순 없어!

translation.en: You could recite an epic poem for me.
A ballad? A sonnet!
-A limerick? Or something! -I don't think so.
Well, can I at least know the name of my champion?
Um, Shrek.
Sir Shrek. [clears throat]
I pray that you take this favour as a token of my gratitude.
Thanks!
You didn't slay the dragon?
-It's on my to-do list. Now come on! -[screams]
[Fiona] But this isn't right!
You were meant to charge in, sword drawn, banner flying.
translation.ko: 돌격해 들어와 검을 뽑고 깃발을 휘날려야지

translation.en: That's what all the other knights did.
[Shrek] Yeah, right before they burst into flame.
That's not the point. Oh!
Wait. Where are you going? The exit's over there.
Well, I have to save my ass.
What kind of knight are you?
One of a kind.
[Donkey] Slow down. Slow down, baby, please.
I believe it's healthy to get to know someone over a long period of time.
translation.ko: 시간을 충분히 가지고 상대를 탐색해야지 내가 좀 고리타분하거든

translation.en: Just call me old-fashioned, you know. [laughs]
I don't want to rush into a physical relationship.
I'm not emotionally ready for a commitment of, uh, this, uh--
translation.ko: 게다가 난 아직 마음의 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: Magnitude really is the word I'm looking for.
Magnitude--Hey, that is unwanted physical contact.
Hey, what are you doing?
Okay, okay. Let's just back up a little and take this one step at a time.
translation.ko: 좋아, 우리 진정하고 한 번에 하나씩 진행하자

translation.en: We really should get to know each other first as friends or pen pals.
translation.ko: 처음엔 단순히 친구로 지내는 거야 펜팔 친구도 좋아

translation.en: 'Cause I'm on the road a lot, but I just love receiving cards--
translation.ko: 난 여행을 많이 다니지만 엽서라면 언제든 환영이니까...

translation.en: Hey, you know I'd really love to stay, but--
Hey, hey! Don't do that! That's my tail! That's my personal tail.
translation.ko: 하지 마! 그건 내 꼬리야! 은밀한 부위라고!

translation.en: You're gonna tear it off. I don't give permission--
translation.ko: 꼬리를 자르는 건 결코 허락할 수...

translation.en: What are you gonna do with that?
Hey, now. No way. No! No!
No, no! No. No, no, no! No! Oh!
translation.ko: 안 돼! 이러지 마! 안 돼!

translation.en: -Hi, Princess! -It talks!
Yeah, it's getting him to shut up that's the trick.
translation.ko: 얜 입을 다무는 게 어렵지 말은 기똥차게 해

translation.en: Okay, you two, head for the exit!
I'll take care of the dragon.
[echoing] Run!
-[dragon growling in the distance] -You did it!
You rescued me! You're amazing. You're--
You're wonderful. You're...
a little unorthodox I'll admit.
But thy deed is great, and thine heart is pure.
-I am eternally in your debt. -[clears throat]
And where would a brave knight be without his noble steed?
I hope you heard that. She called me a noble steed.
She thinks I'm a steed.
[Fiona laughs] The battle is won.
You may remove your helmet, good Sir Knight.
-Uh, no. -Why not?
I have helmet hair.
Please. I would'st look upon the face of my rescuer.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 누가 날 구해줬는지는 봐야 하잖아

translation.en: No, no, you wouldn't-- 'st.
But how will you kiss me?
What? That wasn't in the job description.
Maybe it's a perk.
No, it's destiny. Oh, you must know how it goes.
translation.ko: 아냐, 운명이야 동화를 안 읽나 보구나

translation.en: A princess locked in a tower and beset by a dragon...
is rescued by a brave knight,
and then they share true love's first kiss.
translation.ko: 진정한 사랑의 첫 키스를 나누게 돼

translation.en: Hmm? With Shrek? You think-- Wait.
Wait. You think that Shrek is your true love?
Well, yes.
You think Shrek is your true love!
What is so funny?
Let's just say I'm not your type, okay?
Of course, you are. You're my rescuer.
Now-- Now remove your helmet.
Look. I really don't think this is a good idea.
-Just take off the helmet. -I'm not going to.
-Take it off. -No!
-Now! -Okay!
Easy. As you command, Your Highness.
You-- You're a-- an ogre.
Oh, you were expecting Prince Charming.
Well, yes, actually.
Oh, no. This is all wrong. You're not supposed to be an ogre.
translation.ko: 세상에, 뭔가 잘못됐어 날 구한 게 오거라니 말도 안 돼

translation.en: [sighs] Princess, I was sent to rescue you by Lord Farquaad, okay?
translation.ko: 공주, 사실 날 보낸 건 파콰드 영주야

translation.en: He's the one who wants to marry you.
Then why didn't he come rescue me?
Good question. You should ask him that when we get there.
But I have to be rescued by my true love, not by some ogre and his-- his pet.
translation.ko: 진정한 사랑이 날 구해야 해 오거나 애완동물이 아니라

translation.en: Well, so much for noble steed.
Look princess, you're not making my job any easier.
I'm sorry, but your job is not my problem.
You can tell Lord Farquaad that if he wants to rescue me properly,
translation.ko: 파콰드 영주한테 전해 날 구하려면 제대로 구하라고

translation.en: I'll be waiting for him right here.
Hey! I'm no one's messenger boy, all right? I'm a delivery boy.
translation.ko: 야! 난 심부름꾼이 아냐 배달만 할 뿐이야

translation.en: You wouldn't dare.
-[shrieks] Put me down! -Ya comin', Donkey?
I'm right behind ya.
Put me down, or you will suffer the consequences!
This is not dignified! Put me down! [screams]
[Donkey] Okay, so here's another question.
translation.ko: 좋아, 다음 질문 어떤 여자가 날 좋아하는데

translation.en: Say there's a woman that digs you, right, but you don't really like her that way.
translation.ko: 좋아, 다음 질문 어떤 여자가 날 좋아하는데 난 걔가 별로야

translation.en: How do you let her down real easy so her feelings aren't hurt,
but you don't get burned to a crisp and eaten? How you do that?
You just tell her she's not your true love.
Everyone knowest what happens when you find your--
Hey! [sighs]
The sooner we get to DuLoc the better.
Oh, you're gonna love it there, Princess. It's beautiful!
translation.ko: 네 마음에 들 거야, 진짜 근사해!

translation.en: And what of my groom-to-be? Lord Farquaad? What's he like?
translation.ko: 내 남편 될 사람은? 파콰드 영주 말이야 어떤 사람이야?

translation.en: Well, Let me put it this way, Princess.
Men of Farquaad's stature are in short supply.
translation.ko: 옷 만들 때 보통 사람보다 옷감은 적게 들 거야

translation.en: I don't know. There are those who think little of him.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 영주더러 그릇이 작다는 사람도 있지

translation.en: Stop it. Stop it, both of you.
You're just jealous you can never measure up to a great ruler like Lord Farquaad.
translation.ko: 너희는 질투하는 거야 아무리 노력해도 파콰드 영주만큼 위대하진 못할 테니 말이야

translation.en: Yeah, well, maybe you're right, Princess.
But I'll let you do the "measuring" when you see him tomorrow.
Tomorrow? It'll take that long?
-Shouldn't we stop to make camp? -No, that'll take longer.
translation.ko: - 어디서든 자고 안 갈 거야? - 아니, 그랬다간 더 오래 걸리게?

translation.en: -We can keep going. -But there's robbers in the woods.
translation.ko: - 계속 걸어 - 그러다 숲에서 도둑을 만나면?

translation.en: Whoa! Time out, Shrek! Camping's starting to sound good.
translation.ko: 잠깐만, 슈렉! 공주 말대로 자고 가자

translation.en: Hey, come on. I'm scarier than anything we're going to see in this forest.
translation.ko: 정신 차려, 이 숲에 나보다 무서운 게 어딨다고

translation.en: I need to find somewhere to camp now!
-Hey! Over here. -Shrek, we can do better than that.
translation.ko: - 어이! 이리 와봐 - 슈렉, 여긴 좀 심하잖아

translation.en: I don't think this is fit for a princess.
No, no, it's perfect. It just needs a few homey touches.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 아늑하게 몇 군데만 손보면 돼

translation.en: -Homey touches? Like what? -[crashing]
A door? Well, gentlemen, I bid thee good night.
translation.ko: 문을 달아야지 자, 그럼 잘 자

translation.en: You want me to read you a bedtime story? I will.
[Fiona] I said good night!
Shrek, what are you doing?
[laughs] I just-- You know-- Oh, come on. I was just kidding.
[Shrek] And, uh, that one, that's Throwback,
the only ogre to ever spit over three wheat fields.
translation.ko: 밀밭 3개 거리만큼 침을 뱉은 유일한 오거지

translation.en: Right. Yeah.
Hey, can you tell my future from these stars?
The stars don't tell the future, Donkey. They tell stories.
translation.ko: 별로 알 수 있는 건 미래가 아니라 이야기야

translation.en: Look, there's Bloodnut, the Flatulent.
-You can guess what he's famous for. -I know you're making this up.
translation.ko: 장기가 뭐였는진 말 안 해도 알겠지? 소설 좀 작작 써라

translation.en: No, look. There he is,
and there's the group of hunters running away from his stench.
translation.ko: 저건 방귀 냄새를 맡고 달아나는 사냥꾼 무리야

translation.en: That ain't nothin' but a bunch of little dots.
You know Donkey, sometimes things are more than they appear.
translation.ko: 눈에 보이는 게 다가 아닐 때가 있어

translation.en: Forget it.
Hey, Shrek, what we gonna do when we get our swamp anyway?

Shrek.

we gather here today, to bear witness,

"By night one way, by day another."

Uh, Fiona?

[echoing] "Take love's true form. Take love's true form."
